system.description:
Effect: Roll 1d8 and raise the stages of the stat in the corresponding table by +2 for 5 activations.

  1. ATK
  2. DEF
  3. SPATK
  4. SPDEF
  5. SPD
  6. ACC
  7. EVA
  8. User Choice<>
